howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Follow these simple steps to achieve remarkable HDR enhancements

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Upload your photo easily by dragging and dropping or browsing files. Our platform accepts JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Enhancement
items.description: Our AI analyzes your image and applies sophisticated HDR techniques to enhance dynamic range and vibrancy.

items.title: Download Your Enhanced Photo
items.description: Preview the enhanced image with our comparison slider and download in high quality.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your pressing questions regarding the AI HDR Effect

items.title: What types of images benefit from HDR effects?
items.description: HDR effects work best on landscapes, portraits, and any image where you want to enhance colors and contrast. The AI optimizes brightness and details to create stunning images.

items.title: Is there a cost associated with using the HDR feature?
items.description: Absolutely! Users receive 30 free credits daily to utilize HDR enhancements. For heavier use, affordable subscription options are available.

items.title: Can I use HDR-enhanced images for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes! Subscription plan users can use these images commercially. Free-tier users may use them for personal projects only.

items.title: How is my privacy protected during processing?
items.description: All enhancements occur in your browser, utilizing WebAssembly and JavaScript, ensuring your photos are never uploaded to external servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and witness the stunning results yourself. No sign-up necessary.
